channel.title: Elīna Krastiņa-Grence on Latvian songs ABC notation
channel.description: Recent content in Elīna Krastiņa-Grence on Latvian songs ABC notation

item.title: Look Back at Me Again
item.description: Wait, please look back at me again You are standing by my side now Waiting what I’ll say to you Looking in my eyes so true It never seemed so hard before You, do you know a name of Secret that hides history Heart that finds a mystery? Do you know how it has to be? Wait, before you’ll be gone again Wait, before you will go away Wait, please look back at me again Inside the night a star shines so bright that I see you Into my mind where you tell a story of real truth Your eyesight shows me the way through the darkest heights To your mind where I can see the picture of mine Wait, before you’ll be gone again Wait, before you will go away Wait, please look back at me again Please look back at me Wait, before you’ll be gone again Wait, before you will go away Wait, please look back at me again Please look back at me Wait, before you’ll be gone again Wait, before you will go away Wait, please look back at me again Wait, please look back at me again
